website_summaries.verdict: Save yourself the mounting aggravation, and a little money, with this high-quality tire and wheel combo.
pros: Great price, particularly for a tire and wheel
Comes ready to install, and does so in minutes
cons: Some buyers report minor quality issues with both the tire and wheel

customer_reviews.title: The product appears to be of good quality, however I have not used it
customer_reviews.text: The product appears to be of good quality, however I have not used it, nor will I. To put it simply, the product description is close, but does not accurately represent this wheel. The description indicates 3/4" bearings, whereas the product I received had bushings. There is a critical long term wear and load capacity performance difference between steel bushings and bearings. I am returning the item unused, so I cannot comment on the actual function. I've added a photo of the SKU showing the bushing call out.
customer_reviews.author: Generally Balanced POV

customer_reviews.title: Replacement wheels/tires
customer_reviews.text: Got this for replacements on a wagon we have, they are the right size according to the wheels on the wagon and the website we purchase it from, but they require extra washers so they don't slide all over the place on the rod.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cato

customer_reviews.title: I only needed a new tire but for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: I only needed a new tire but for the price was well worth not having to fight mounting. Came with 3/4 sealed roller bearings, an upgrade from the brass bushings on my old wheel. Tire tread was not as tall or thick as a premium tire alone, but it's the front tire so doesn't really matter. Con, now I need to buy a matching one for the other side, pro, ready to go, even aired up already.
customer_reviews.author: Jared D.

customer_reviews.title: exactly the same as the OEM part!
customer_reviews.text: I had a tire get dry-rot on my mower and burst. I called Sears to get a price on replacing it and was told the part would be almost $200 plus shipping. I went to two local home goods stores (one with a blue logo and one with an orange one) and they had tires for mowers, but not exactly the size I needed. Found this and ordered it. Putting it on took all of 20 minutes, including removing the jack and putting it back in my trunk! Mower now drives like new. This one even has the lube nipple on the outside, instead of having to lift the mower and get behind the tire to access.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Rollin, Rollin, Rollin ... Rawhide
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement on for a Troy-Bilt deck mower I'm too old and time is too short to dick around with dismounting and remounting the tire, for an extra ten bucks I could just replace the entire wheel. Pull the cotter pin, clean and grease the axle, pop on the wheel, replace the pin ... five minutes at the most. Old wheels went to the curb, someone snagged them with 20 minutes ... so I didin't even have to deal with disposal.
customer_reviews.author: UnregisteredTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire, Better Than Repairing the tube.
customer_reviews.text: Great tire, cheaper to buy the whole thing than trying to replace the tube. it's been a few months and it's actually performing better than the originals. It's slightly higher than the original so on turns it scrapes a bit with my mowers fender, but not so often that it's forced me to shave the fender but I could if I needed to. Great Tire all around and definitely better than fussing with the tube any day of the week, those who have tried know what I mean. it's just not worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto L Torna

customer_reviews.title: Troy Bilt Replacements
customer_reviews.text: These were a perfect replacement on my Troy Bilt. I got the mover second hand and one of the front tires was pretty much bald, the other still had tread but was getting worn. These new tires have made a world of difference in the turning ability of the mower. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great for Craftsman R1000 front tire replacement
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to install. I was amazed at how difficult it was to find a replacement locally for this tire! So glad to find it here on Amazon. In my photo the tire on the left of the replacement in the tire on the right is the original. You cannot tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Snazzykatrogers

customer_reviews.title: It's a tire and wheel.
customer_reviews.text: The biggest gripe is that when they installed the bushings into the bore of the wheel, they hadn't drilled the grease zirk in the right spot, so the large iron bushing crushed and plugged the grease zirk. You'll need to grease the axle before installation and it will require full removal to grease again. It'll work great for my application, but someone else might want to know.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: ... with my riding lawn mower -- but they work great anyway. I originally wanted a solid filled tire
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is a little less tall and a little less wide at the hub than came on the dump trailer I pull with my riding lawn mower -- but they work great anyway. I originally wanted a solid filled tire, but for the price this looked like a good option. The height was no problem and I just used a few large washers to adjust for the width. Getting the exact replacement wheel was going to cost a lot more money. About 15 minutes changing out the wheels and the trailer was back at work. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DDos

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but the wrong size for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: For those who have the LA105 John Deere that came with a free dump trailer - this rim will not fit - it fits the axle circumference, but it's to thick - axle is not long enough and you can't use the pin to hold the wheel on. I gave it 5 stars because the tire is good quality as is the tube (It's not the sellers fault it doesn't fit) - which I removed from this rim and put them both on a rim that does fit.. of course I punctured the tube during the process but green slime saved the day.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Chapman

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, cheap import, ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, cheap import, tires aren't round, they wobble. Grease fittings fell out, threads were stripped. Doesn't matter much since the bearings have rubber seals on the inside so no grease would get to them anyway. Have to remove the bearings in order to remove the inner seals and they will be destroyed once your done. I expected cheap but these are a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: pinkboog

customer_reviews.title: lawn mower tires
customer_reviews.text: yes they work great for my lawn mower. when it says 3/4 Bushings they are not Bushings they are bearings but thats ok they still fit.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Huntzinger

customer_reviews.title: Not 13"
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I had found a low cost replacement tire for my zero turn. When I tried to mount it I found out the tire is actually 13.5 inches, not 13 inches. Mounted it couldn't clear the wheel assembly.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Hiner Jr.

customer_reviews.title: No good after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: We've had this tire on our lawn mower about 6 months now and there is a hole in it. We haven't ran over anything except grass in our yard because we don't have trees or bushes in our yard so no debris of any type. Pretty irritated this tire only lasted 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Reeder

customer_reviews.title: FLAT WITHIN A COUPLE OF WEEKS
customer_reviews.text: After airing up a couple of front tires on my zero turn for a couple of seasons I decided to upgrade to new hubs with tires. Order 2 of these...fit was perfect. Mowed a couple of times...very happy not to have to air up before beginning mowing. Start to mow today and notice that BOTH FRONT TIRES ARE FLAT...you got to be kidding me. So, I guess there's not such thing as a lawn hub and tire that will hold air. I'll be buying tubes next.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, Not Great.
customer_reviews.text: Knowing the issues people have had with the tires I replaced them with Carlise tires. That being said, while the outside face of the rim is strong enough, the inside face is made of a thinner steel and it bent under the tire mounting pressure. I've mounted a number of small tires and have never had a rim do this. It's also a tube tire and rim, which at least as of this writing is not mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: WET

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but didn't work out.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tire as a replacement for my outdoor Precision cart. Used the exact measurements listed on tire but it didn't fit the axle no matter what we tried. The good news? Amazon always good for a return and fast refund when it doesn't work out. If I can just figure this axle thing out I will re-order. I would rather order from Amazon than go shopping.
customer_reviews.author: nursef40

customer_reviews.title: Garden Cart back in use.
customer_reviews.text: Wheel replacement for garden cart used in hauling plants. None available locally that were the right size. Delivered as promised to my front door and placed into service immediately. Back to carting around and not hand hauling potted plants.
customer_reviews.author: jburnie

customer_reviews.title: Air filled tire
customer_reviews.text: Put these on a small homemade farm/garden trailer. They work great. Was worried if they could handle the loads I would be putting on the trailer. They have never let me down. Do the job and roll nice over uneven ground. Included both tire and rim, with grease zerk and bearings. I did replace the bearings, no due to failure but due to them being 3/4" and my axle being 1/2".
customer_reviews.author: Jim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a lawnmower. Works well, we switched out the bushing it came with for a heavy duty ball bearing. The tire and rip themselves have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Fields

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Locally, about $12. more each and I had to bring my wheels to the lawn shop. The convenience of these tires is just amazing. Great looking tires and wheels, until you cut your grass of course. Very easy installation, don't forget a cotter pin! Love that they have a nipple to grease the hub!
customer_reviews.author: Callery59

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: Inherited a trailer from my neighbor for my lawn tractor. I use the trailer to haul fire wood or other tasks that the wheel barrow is not suited for. The wheels were the same size as the flat ones they replaced and the price for the pair was terrific-- less than I paid for just one wheel at the local tractor supply. The wheels have bearings and worked just fine for me. I like to buy local but this was too good a deal to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Traub

customer_reviews.title: Great Wheels for riding lawnmowers!
customer_reviews.text: I just put my new wheels & tires on my Poulan riding lawn tractor &I love them! They were exactly the right size & was very, very easy to put on. They even have the grease fitting on them! Nothing cheap about them but the price! They were exactly like the originals that came on the mower new!
customer_reviews.author: crldyshotgun

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for a Sears riding mower (rear motor). Purchased from Sears but (luckily) they sent me the wrong wheel/tire. So I found this combination and ordered it after sending the Sears product back. Guess what? I paid $40 less and it fits and works great! Comes inflated and ready to install.
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: Poor manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: Grease fitting was stripped out and obviously tried to fix at the factory since they just added one more washer to try to hide the defect.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Ensure  your original tire height as this one is 1.25” taller than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for $18 ea. Seem heavy duty but taller than advertised and one of the wheels is warped. Amazon was good enough to offer replacements but I preferred a discount of $8. I'll live w/ the issues.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: The cheapist thing ever, the rim is made of ...
customer_reviews.text: The cheapist thing ever, the rim is made of the cheapist quality, no strength at all, the rims bend just from dismounting the tire. The tire is a tube tire. The bearings complete blew apart after a couple months on my lawn mower. And the tread is more than half way gone already.
customer_reviews.author: Chad S.

customer_reviews.title: fit nice
customer_reviews.text: i like the axel fit i thought it was berrings but it was busshings yea well the psice was great and discription was right on overall i would buy them again and recomend them to everybody
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Wide hub. Check measurements for your needs first.
customer_reviews.text: To wide of a hub for what I need it for. Seems quality and sturdy. I work way to much and just now got around trying to replace my damaged wheel. I was disappointed when this one wouldn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jake W ia

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: When I had received this tire it did not have the same measurements as the tire I was replacing even though it was exactly the same size and same size rim. Not sure who is wrong with the sizing there tire or mine but very unhappy that it ended that way.
customer_reviews.author: James Taz

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Wheels work great on our Craftsman Model 610243551 Steel Dump Cart we use behind our Lawn Tractor. The bearings are designed to fit a 3/4" Diameter Axle perfectly. The only thing I noticed about these wheels were a slight wobble when rolling which I might attribute to the rims themselves being slightly off. Not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Blewzdood

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Not a fit , I matched all the numbers from the tire and there the same but the hub part is way different , any chance I can exchange ? By time I had any one to fix for me I was past the 30 days I put 5 stars cause the tire is good. Just the time to return is to short
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Bought the tire without checking the size of the hub (my bad). I took the tire off the rim it came with and place it on my old rim. The tire is on my yard trailer and doing well. The tire seems to be well made, but only time will tell. I didn't loose on the deal because this tire and rim were the same price as other tires without the rim.
customer_reviews.author: RJS

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty Tread
customer_reviews.text: I admit it, I ordered the wrong size shaft and I will either have to return this tire or use it on another project. Even so, I found the tire to be well made and rubber tread rather heavy duty. Can't knock the product because of my error.
customer_reviews.author: William Struse

customer_reviews.title: Price was great and delivery fast.
customer_reviews.text: Our rider lawn mower had a flat. It was easier to put a new tire on than fix the old. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap and fit my John Deer mower
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old tire for a fifth the cost of the John Deer tires
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replaced z790 tires
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my z790 John Deere tires at great price
customer_reviews.author: Burger king

customer_reviews.title: Not the highest quality but they work just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! for $20 how can you go wrong? You get a tire, rim, tube and two bearings. Not the highest quality but they work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: this is the perfect garden wagon tire replacement
customer_reviews.text: this is the perfect garden wagon tire replacement. i search and call all over. one place price over $130 for the two. i coudl buy a new wagon. the axel hole is large where manyother replacement are too small.
customer_reviews.author: Gail J. Kuiper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit on my Troy Bilt rider
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit on my Troy Bilt rider. Fifteen minute replacement, both front wheels. Came in ready to install. Also I like the idea of having the grease fittings on the outside of rim.
customer_reviews.author: madeleine watkins

customer_reviews.title: Barrel Car Tires
customer_reviews.text: Great tire, I use these for barrel cars I make. I have never had an issue with these, they really last. They fit a 3/4in steel axle. I use a 3/4in washer and cotter pin to keep them on the axle. They have bearings, just need to grease them after installation.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: What I received was not as described or pictured. ...
customer_reviews.text: What I received was not as described or pictured. What i see and read are "bearings" but what I got just had bushings. Not at all the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: chester

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: looked for a year for a replacement tire for out ez stow cart. finally found this . It was easy to install perfect fit and now back to business on our yard work thank you for selling this.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, thrilled with quality of purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit as advertised! My little Murray was back up and running within 10 minutes. Bought 2 for the price of 1 on other sites. 4 for the cost of one original mfg. product.
customer_reviews.author: JimGoSaints

customer_reviews.title: Not for Razor Dirt Quad
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a replacement for my son's electric atv (Razor Dirt Quad - Black  as it was listed as a replacementreplacement. The rims where different, with only one hole in the center. I was able to use the tires abs swap the rims out.
customer_reviews.author: Rances

customer_reviews.title: May not fit your application
customer_reviews.text: I searched Amazon for tires with wheels that fit my Cub Cadet RZT50. This tire came back in the results but do not fit. Tire is the right size but the wheel is too narrow. By the time I got a chance to install them, the return window passed.
customer_reviews.author: mr camper

customer_reviews.title: Not for Agco Allis Simplicity 413H
customer_reviews.text: It was taller than my existing 13x5.00-6 tire on my Agco Allis Simplicity 413H by about a half inch and made my mower un-level. It also caused it to rub against the metal under my mower. Returned this to amazon and just paid a local mower store $20 to fix the flat tire.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: but looks like a good lawn morrow tire
customer_reviews.text: Have not used lawn morrow since it is still winter,but looks like a good lawn morrow tire,except,one major problem, the wheel rim did not fit my lawn morrow so I had to pay 17 dollars for them to get put on my rims that came with sit down morrow 😏
customer_reviews.author: America Hero 2

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe the price. Got the tire and it was mounted on the rim with a zerk fitting and tire was inflated. Lowes tire was 49.99 and no rim. Walmart was 23.00 and no rim. Troy Built was 99.99. This tire was 17.00 with rim and already inflated, and all the same dam tire! Cant go wrong here. Already put it on and mowed. Great product and price and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: truckpoppypops

customer_reviews.title: Great tire and wheel assembly for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pulled them out the box, had them installed faster than it took the time to raise the mower. So far, they seem to be getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: W. F. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Rear Engine Rider
customer_reviews.text: I've mowed 3 times since installing these tires on the front of my Troy Bilt Rear Engine Rider. Perfect fit and good looking. No problems so far with the mowing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for John Deere rider
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my front tires on D 140 John Deere rider and they do well. They are narrower than the original, but much better than the bald tires I replaced. These have tubes, so that is plus as I had to add tubes to the original tires.
customer_reviews.author: Ron D. M.

customer_reviews.title: Not an exact replacement for TroyBilt TB-30
customer_reviews.text: Not an exact replacement for TroyBilt TB-30 (slightly taller even though same size on tire). Buy two to ensure good match.
customer_reviews.author: K.G. Carson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Funny thing is it is the same tread pattern as ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Snapper riding mower. It is not a drive rim. However it was cheaper to buy the entire assembly rather than the tube and tire separably. I just swapped rims. Funny thing is it is the same tread pattern as the old tire.
customer_reviews.author: clayton

customer_reviews.title: A great deal
customer_reviews.text: Must admit I was skeptical but it turned out to be a perfect fit for my mower.
customer_reviews.author: keithlevine

customer_reviews.title: Probably brought the wrong one Rim was different so it ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably brought the wrong one Rim was different so it didn't fit, and tire slightly larger and wider even though the sizes read the same thing just replace the tire on the new one with the old one and it worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stratic

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire
customer_reviews.text: These tires are nice but did not fit our cart so had to return them. Wish they would have fit!
customer_reviews.author: Carole R. NAPOLI

customer_reviews.title: Work well on a garden cart
customer_reviews.text: I have a small dump cart for behind my lawnmower. The old wheels had rusted through and the tires had dry rotted. I put these on, they are a little smaller diameter but worked well and seem to do the job. We put hay bales in the wagon and other things and it is doing fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L. Granger

customer_reviews.title: Fits the blue hawk just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Yes. This is my first review of anything ever but I feel compelled to do this because of the time wasted going to Lowe's and finding out they don't have what you need. This fits a blue hawk 10ft dump cart from Lowe's. axle a little short but can't beat the price and they don't even sell replacements at Lowe's another reason to never leave the house to shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Tire/Rim
customer_reviews.text: This most likely will fill your expectations as it is very well made and stout. I bought one to see how well it fit my garden wagon, and no problems, so I ordered one more and plan to get the next 2 on payday. My axle diameter is 5/8" (a little under) so I ordered a bushing, Amazon white nylon 101 round tube 3/4"od x 5/8" id x 12"l item #BSNY-5231-12-01. The axle bronze bushing ID 0 .7515 so a little coaching may be needed. The 12" nylon tube is long enough to do 4 tires.
customer_reviews.author: Sagebrush Charlie

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: received almost a month later, I ask for two wheels to replace in my mower, in the wheels I buy that says they have bearings and I receive one that has bearings and the other does not, they do not serve me, I can not return for high importation costs, company is very little serious I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Javier Álvarez Quiñones

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product although it wasn't the size I needed , it was my mistake . But if it was it would have been perfect . Came with air in it all I would've had to do was mount it .
customer_reviews.author: Chris Harris

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: These wheels replaced a couple of wagon wheels that were completely shot. They were just the right size. They have been holding in the wagon that is loaded with crushed limestone for about five months with no problems. This below zero weather does not seem to have affected them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gentleman Jim

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and they fit however because of the protrusion in the center of the tire which is not like the one it replaced it doesn't fit as it should on the stem of the wagon i bought it for and i have to keep tightening the nut as it doesn't fit all the way on as it should
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Great products!
customer_reviews.text: It’s just too bad that one side was too long, or they would have been perfect! Great Quality!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly with no fuss of trying to install the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly with no fuss of trying to install the inner tube. I was mowing the lawn roughly ten minutes after removing it from the box.
customer_reviews.author: dnaph

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We needed new tires and these were substantially less than ordering from the manufacturer. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: cchamp

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than the sum of it's parts
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as listed. I needed a tire for my generic Chinese yard trailer but it was cheaper to buy this and break it down for parts.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good looking tire and seems to be holding up very well
customer_reviews.author: jimmyanne

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic deal on wheel and tire
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic deal on wheel and tire. I couldn't buy the tire here in the town I live in as inexpensive as I purchased it all right here. Had it the next day too!
customer_reviews.author: MDW

customer_reviews.title: A bargain and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and far better quality than came with my original MTD/Murray riding mower tires. Heck, they were even inflated right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to send it back. Because my axle's on my wagon were smaller. SORRY
customer_reviews.author: Tim McFarland

customer_reviews.title: NOT we’re eater one mower compatible
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT fit weed eater one mower. The rim part, where the shaft goes through is too wide. You cannot secure the tire into place.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie09

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Looked all over for a tire for my lawnmower. This is perfect. Just as advertised. Tire and rim, aired up and ready to go. Easy to put on. Only problem is now I have no excuse not to get the mowing done.
customer_reviews.author: Renita

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than just a tire
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and fit for my lawnmower. Cheaper than just a tire...with a painted rim and bearing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, decent quality for what Im using it for (kids wagon)and pricing is very competitive.
customer_reviews.author: TLB

customer_reviews.title: Dealer Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: The lawn mower wheel (tire, tube and rim) were as advertised, but didn't fit my old Weed Eater One. My fault, I didn't see the difference in hub size. Dealer approved return with NO charge and promptly refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: Ed L.

customer_reviews.title: What a deal
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe I replaced both front tires and wheels for a total of $41.00. If you have ever tried to mount a small tire on a wheel, then you can truly appreciate getting the whole package. Looks like good quality and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe you could get the tire and rim for a little more than $26.00 Arrived in 3 days and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Mark N Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Delivered promptly so that I was able to install it in minutes from the time it arrived.
customer_reviews.text: It was ready to use in minutes from the time it arrived. I installed it on my backyard utility cart.
customer_reviews.author: Don Feenstra

customer_reviews.title: Great but stem issues
customer_reviews.text: Good tires and rims Trouble with valve stems breaking off on wheel The hard plastic stems just snapped off . Plastic maybe too hard.?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Marathon tires and rims
customer_reviews.text: These tire and tubes and rims are a great replacement for the original tires and rims that came on my rider .i recommend them if you need a replacement .
customer_reviews.author: Maynard H.

customer_reviews.title: worked great. Great value
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the tires on my trailer with these, worked great. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: easy installation, and work
customer_reviews.text: These tires and wheel combos are the way to go, easy installation, and work great
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I have two of these on my lawn cart now ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these on my lawn cart now.rease They are very well made and you can grease them.This should make them last and last.
customer_reviews.author: MTB

customer_reviews.title: Good tire and wheel for older JD cart
customer_reviews.text: It fit my John Deere 7 cart axle. The edge of tire might rub the side of the cart occasionally, I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Landau Cowrecian

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you check the size of your bearings. I didn't realize they were all different sizes and the return shipping cost is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: These wheels are a little skinnier that the ones that ...
customer_reviews.text: These wheels are a little skinnier that the ones that came on my gorilla cart,but they work just as well. No problems what so ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked just fine, no problems
customer_reviews.text: worked just fine, no problems. When I put it in my wish list and went to purchase it a week later it went up $5 for each tire which I didn't think was right
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed tire. Good packaging. Shipped inflated - good way to ensure quality - no leakage. Sealed bearings. Would have given 5 stars if I could have slipped it onto the mounting shaft, without having to file/sand the mounting shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Dilip

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Fit exactly and great quality and totally satisfied. Also arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Ray

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Tire started leaking after 3 uses, replaced tube and sidewall of tire split 2 weeks later. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L.

customer_reviews.title: Tire matched exactly
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time and as described without the pictured rim ( which I was not expecting and did not receive).
customer_reviews.author: steves145

customer_reviews.title: Can the wheel be fixed???
customer_reviews.text: The tire would be perfect except the axle hole is too big. Don't know how to fix it effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Corky

customer_reviews.title: I did not fit and the company gave us perfect instructions on how to send it back
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the tire hoping it would fit the axle. I did not fit and the company gave us perfect instructions on how to send it back. We have sent it back already. Not sure if we want to try another on when we can't compare axle. Thanks. LC
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the right tire and fit perfectly. Thanks for the quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Great product and cheaper than if i purchased the tube ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and cheaper than if i purchased the tube and tire. It's a no brainer for the price you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Chud

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly and fits perfectly. Holds pressure well, and is durable. Installed on a garden trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Hub is larger than 3 inches end to end will not fit my wagon axel
customer_reviews.author: marion1739

product_meta.title: Marathon 20336 13x5.00-6" Pneumatic (Air Filled) Lawnmower Tire on Wheel, Single
product_meta.description: 13x5.00-6-Inch Air-Filled (Pneumatic) Lawnmower Tire. Comes standard with a 3"-Inch centered hub and 3/4"-Inch Commercial Grade Oil Infused Bushings. Turf Tread. Rim Diameter 6 inch
feature_bullets: 3" Centered hub. 3/4" Heavy duty oil infused bushings
Perfect Replacement tire for lawn mowers - check your Current tire Sidewall size, Bearing/bushing and Hub for match.
350 lb Load capacity. Inflate with Manual pump only. Not for highway use.
